name: AutoAds Premiere
author: Wutime

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to quickly add Google Adsense AutoAds to your website.

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Add your Publisher ID
  3. Select pages to show adverts on
  4. Determine roles to ignore
  5. Save your settings
  6. Profit!

In addition to specifying your Google AdSense Publisher ID you can also exclude specific roles from seeing advertisements with a quick click.

Support

Support is available through the WordPress Support Forums or though my contact page.

Installlation

  • Install
  • Activate
  • Edit Settings
  • Select Page Types to Show Adverts
  • Profit!
sections.faq:
Where do I find my Google Adsense Publisher ID

Please visit Google Adsense Publisher ID

Advertisements are not showing

  • Be sure to include your full Publisher ID (Example: ca-pub-1234567890)
  • Be sure to select pages and types to show advertisements on
  • Be sure you did not choose NOT to show advertisements as Administrator while logged in as Administor
  • Be sure to “view source” and make sure your code is showing in tags
  • If everything looks good, wait a few days for Google to decide where to place advertisements on your site (can take up to a week)
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Updated: Latest Google AdSense code
  • Fix: Duplicate save message
  • Release Date – August 28th, 2024
  • Added nonce verification to all forms
  • Added english PO file for translations
  • Added proper case to Page Types
  • Added proper case to Roles
  • Tested up to 6.6.1

1.2.1

  • Release Date – November 19th, 2020
  • Added specific page types to include advertisements on
  • YOU MUST edit settings and check each specific page type you want adverts to run on (ads will not show until you do so)
  • Removed var_dump() testing data (oops)

short_description: AutoAds Premiere allows you to quickly display advertisements on your website.

In addition to specifying your Google AdSense Publisher ID you can also exclude specific roles from seeing advertisements with a quick click.

upgrade_notice: • Make sure you select pages and types of pages to show advertisements on or no advertisement code will render on your pages

screenshots.caption: Settings for your Google Adsense Publisher ID and the ability to disable advertisements for select roles
